item.trans: adj. 人际的；人与人之间的 High- context cultures place higher value on interpersonal relations in deciding whether to enter into business arrangement .在决定是否加入商业约定时，背景相关度高的文化更重视人际关系。

adj. 商业的；商人的；重商主义的 n. 商品 同义词:commercial, shoppy, goods, wares, merchantable product First came the Chicago Mercantile Exchange ( CME ), whose share price has rocketed since it went public in 2002 .在美国，先是芝加哥商业交易所（期货市场CME），其股票价格从2002年上市后就飞速上升。
n. 脆弱；[力] 易碎性；虚弱 同义词:frangibility, friability Such examples hint at the fragility of a globalised world .这些例证也暗示了一个全球化世界的脆弱。
n. （法国封建时代的）城堡；（尤指法国的）别墅 同义词:villa, castle For three heavy hours , the stone faces of the chateau , lion and human , stared blindly at the night .庄园里的石面孔（狮子的面孔，人的面孔）茫然地望着黑夜，望了三个沉重的小时。
adj. 防锈的；不锈的 vt. 使抗锈 同义词:stainless, anti-rust Stainless products are always popular because they're rustproof .不锈钢制品因为能防锈，所以很受欢迎。
n. 先决条件 adj. 首要必备的 同义词:prior condition, pre-condition A second prerequisite is that uranium 235 must be present in sufficient abundance .第二个必要条件是，铀235的含量必须够充足。
n. 导电性；[物][生理] 传导性 同义词:electroconductibility One major disadvantage of anodized surfaces is their very poor conductivity .阳极化处理表面的一个主要缺点是它的导热性非常低劣。
n. 知觉；[生理] 感觉；看法；洞察力；获取 同义词:consciousness, viewpoint, sense, feel, insight Her perception of the right seemed almost intuitive .她对正确事物的理解几乎是直觉的。
adj. 不符合传统的，非传统的 同义词:unconventional, unorthodoxy Diarrhea cases were widely dispersed and detected by using nontraditional surveillance techniques .腹泻疾病大肆传播，且只能通过非传统的监测技术侦查到。
n. 仙人掌（cactus的复数形式） I love cacti , because of his strong vitality .我爱仙人掌，因为他生命力极强。
vt. 负担过度（过去式overtaxed，过去分词overtaxed，现在分词overtaxing，第三人称单数overtaxes，名词overtaxation）；[税收] 课税过重；使工作过度 Overtaxed , overworked and paid off with a knife , a club or a rope .人民苛捐杂税，超负荷的工作所得到的报酬就是大刀，棍棒加套索！
n. 环境；安装；布置；[天] 沉落 v. 放置；沉没；使…处于某位置（set的ing形式） 同义词:context, circumstance, installation, arrangement, surrounding, putting, positioning, laying to set a magazine on the teapoy把杂志放在茶几上
vt. 雕，刻；凿；欺骗 vi. 雕，刻；凿；欺骗 n. 凿子 同义词:chip, sell, character, kid, pull a fast one, firmer It is a bust chiseled from a rock.那是一座石雕半身像。
vt. 保存；将…做成蜜饯；使守恒 n. 果酱；蜜饯 同义词:save, hold, confiture, glazed fruit to conserve one's strength保存自己的力量
n. 膨胀；通货膨胀；夸张；自命不凡 同义词:expansion, bulking This could be due to inflation .这个可能归因于通货膨胀。
adj. 令人震惊的；令人惊骇的 同义词:electric, shocking What has happened in China for the last twenty years is by any standard astounding .中国过去二十年的发展，以任何标准来看，都属成绩骄人。
vt. 使都市化；使文雅 同义词:citify to urbanize a district使一地区城市化
vt. 命令；口述；使听写 vi. 口述；听写 n. 命令；指示 同义词:require, order, command, instruction, order, bidding, telling, word The president has dictated some letters to his secretary.总裁已向秘书口授了一些信稿。
adj. 本质的，固有的 同义词:essential, inherent, interior, constitutional Happiness is intrinsic , it 's an internal thing.幸福是固有的，它是发自内心的。
n. 中风；冲程；笔画；打击；尝试；轻抚 vt. 抚摸；敲击；划尾桨；划掉 vi. 击球；作尾桨手；敲击键盘 同义词:blow, shock, experiment, go, strike, dong, daut, hit the ball He stroked the name of himself with his pen.他用钢笔划掉了他自己的名字。
n. 核心，要点；[计] 内核；仁；麦粒，谷粒；精髓 同义词:quick, main, heart, essential, nucleus The kernel of capital market order is to maintain market transparence .资本市场秩序的核心是维护市场透明度。
adj. 镇静的；沉着的 v. 组成；作曲（compose的过去分词）；著作 同义词:killed, calm, steady England, Scotland and Wales compose the island of Great Britain.英格兰、苏格兰和威尔士组成大不列颠岛国。
n. 存货，存货清单；详细目录；财产清册 同义词:goods in stock, stock-sheet The store inventories its stock once a month.该商店每月盘点一次存货。
adj. 民用的；百姓的，平民的 n. 平民，百姓 同义词:many-headed, populace, common man Incidentally , that story about the big convoy from San Francisco is civilian morale .顺便提一句，关于从旧金山开来庞大护船队的传说是安抚民心的空话。
n. 复杂；诡辩；老于世故；有教养 同义词:complexity, intricacy If the price of sophistication is instability , something is wrong .如果复杂的代价是不稳定，那么某些东西是错了。
vi. 打，打击；罢工；敲，敲击；抓；打动；穿透 vt. 打，击；罢工；撞击，冲击；侵袭；打动；到达 n. 罢工；打击；殴打 同义词:grasp, beat upon, impact, beat upon, stroke, shock, hit, hiding He's struck by his father.他挨了父亲的打。
n. 间隙；缺口；空白 vi. 裂开 vt. 使成缺口 同义词:separation, blank, seam, spring off, jag There is an gap between what IQ tests can measure and what we want to them to show .在智商测试所能测量的和我们希望这些测试所显示的之间存在着巨大的鸿沟。
vt. 使用，采用；雇用；使忙于，使从事于 n. 使用；雇用 同义词:introduce, make use of, fashion, exercise, usage, utilization, use, hire This factory employs thousands of people.这家工厂雇用数千人。
adv. 对角地；斜对地 同义词:cornerways, arrisways The building comprises two stacked , diagonally -staggered , concrete volumes .建设包括两个堆叠，角交错，具体数量。

n. 集合；一套；布景；装置 vt. 树立；点燃；点缀； vi. (日,月)落沉；凝固；结果 adj. 固定的；规定的；固执的 同义词:device, apparatus, installation, assembly, tendency, unit, direction, put, fire, rear, light, result, bottom line, specified, stated, fixed, prescribed, regulation to set a magazine on the teapoy把杂志放在茶几上
vt. 赌运气；冒…的危险，使遭受危险 n. 危险，冒险；冒险的事 同义词:risk, risk, throw, venture, adventure In making the investment, he hazarded all his savings.他不顾风险，把所有的积蓄全都投了资。
adj. 复杂的；错综的，缠结的 同义词:complicated, sophisticated, involved, detailed This is a novel with an intricate plot .这是一本情节错综复杂的小说。
n. 集装箱；容器 同义词:vessel, pocket Cover the container with a clean piece of wood .在容器上盖上一块干净的木板。
vt. 吞食；毁灭；凝视 同义词:devastate, wrack and ruin The hungry man devoured his dinner.那饿汉狼吞虎咽地把饭吃光了。
n. 领域，范围；王国 同义词:domain, territory, kingdom, province, world, universe, extent Loop gravity extends this insight into the quantum realm .环圈重力将这个见解援引至量子领域。

adj. 持续的；持久的；持久不变的 v. 维持（sustain的过去式和过去分词）；承受 同义词:continuing, lasting, kept Fuel up with healthy snacks. Large meals can make you drowsy . Try eating smaller meals and more healthy snacks throughout the day for sustained energy .通过健康有节制的饮食来补充能量。大吃大喝会让你昏昏欲睡。试一试每天少吃多餐来保持一整天的能量。
adj. 加重的；令人恼怒的 v. 使恶化；激怒（aggravate的ing形式） 同义词:weighted, anabatic, provoking The bad weather aggravated his illness.坏天气加重了他的病情。
n. 寄生虫；食客 同义词:helminth, vermin Mistletoe is a parasite plant .它是一种寄生植物。
n. 建设；建筑物；解释；造句 同义词:interpretation, explanation, fabric, building, structure But most of the casinos are still under construction .然而大多数赌场的建设仍在进行中。

adj. 供选择的；选择性的；交替的 n. 二中择一；供替代的选择 同义词:selective, vicissitudinary An alternative to the all red bouquet is to buy some white roses and insert one red one in the center of the bunch.一种花束与所有都是红色花朵的花束不一样是，去购买一些白色的玫瑰穿插在红色的玫瑰花束中。
vi. 消失；突然不见；成为零 vt. 使不见，使消失 n. 弱化音 同义词:disappear, blank, unmake The mysterious woman passenger vanished.这位神秘的女乘客突然不见了。
adj. 兼容的；能共处的；可并立的 We return again to the search for a compatible element .我们回过头来再去寻找相容的元素。
n. 挖掘，发掘 同义词:digging, disinterment The treasure survived until its excavation in 1978 .在1978年以前，这批宝物一直沉睡于地下。
n. 术语，术语学；用辞 同义词:technology, onym The terminology of financial markets can be imprecise .金融市场术语的定义也许不那么精准。
adj. 多样化的；各种的 v. 使…多样化（diversify的过去分词） to diversify the services使服务多样化
n. 鼓舞，刺激；马刺；山坡 vi. 骑马疾驰；给予刺激 vt. 激励，鞭策；给…装踢马刺 同义词:stimulus, inspiration, incentive, excitement, needle, stimulate, power He spurred his horse to catch the last post.他催马快跑，以便赶上最后一班收信时间。
n. 公差；宽容；容忍；公差 同义词:patience, charity, mercy But zero tolerance of what ?但对什么零容忍呢？
n. [木] 厚木板；支架；政纲条款 vt. 在…上铺板；撂下；立刻付款 同义词:rest, supporting stand to plank a ship's deck在船的甲板上铺板
adj. 不可思议的，奇迹的 同义词:magic, mysterious, fantastic Interest , allowing the transfer of value through time , miraculous .允许价值随时间转移的利率堪称奇迹。
adj. 怪异的；不可思议的；超自然的 n. （苏格兰）命运；预言 同义词:magic, mysterious, fantastic, fate, prediction, lot, destiny, fortune Wait , is that a new weird kid from Pakistan ?等一下，是不是那个新来的巴基斯坦怪小孩？
n. 学科；纪律；训练；惩罚 vt. 训练，训导；惩戒 同义词:science, punishment, rod, knowledge, payment, coach, drill The football team was disciplined by a professional trainer.这支足球队受过专业教练员的训练。
n. 碎石，碎砖；粗石堆 同义词:crushed stone, rockfill The town has twice been rubbled in battle.这个城镇曾经两次毁于战争。
n. 掠夺，劫掠；大乌鸦 adj. 乌黑的 vt. 掠夺；狼吞虎咽 vi. 掠夺；狼吞虎咽 同义词:rapine, plunderage, sooty, harry, despoil, prey upon, gobble up The hungry rat ravened down the poison bait.饥饿的老鼠一口吞下毒饵。
n. 领域；牧场；旷野；战场；运动场 vi. 担任场外队员 adj. 扫描场；田赛的；野生的 vt. 把暴晒于场上；使上场 同义词:domain, province, territory, world, kingdom, universe, wild, feral He fielded the ball smartly.他机敏地截住球。
n. 严肃；刺耳；粗糙的事物 同义词:serious about, solemnity For all its harshness and irrationality , it is the only world we've got.尽管它严酷而又不合理，它终究是我们具有的唯一的世界。
vt. 使竖立；建造；安装 adj. 竖立的；笔直的；因性刺激而勃起的 vi. 直立；勃起 同义词:construct, fit, fix, structure, frame, straight, upright, to stand on end, get it up to erect a house盖房
n. [解剖] 神经元，神经单位 同义词:nerve fiber Phillips has one candidate cell in mind : the motor neuron , which directs muscles from the brain and spinal cord .菲力普斯心目中有个理想目标，就是运动神经元，它也是脑与脊髓控制肌肉的媒介。
n. [岩] 石灰岩 The limestone absorbs impurities from the ore .石灰石从矿石中吸收杂质。
n. 迷宫；[解剖] 迷路；难解的事物 同义词:maze, mavericks Place O -ring into ID groove of Labyrinth Rotor Sleeve .置O形圈于迷宫转子衬套内径槽内。
n. 千年期（millennium的复数）；一千年；千年庆典；太平盛世 millennia , history has told us the story .两千年来，历史告诉我们这样一个故事。
n. 光，光亮；灯 adj. 轻的；光亮的；容易的 vi. 点着；变亮；著火 vt. 照亮；点燃；着火 adv. 轻地 同义词:lamp, lucency, easy, shining, brighten, lamp, lumine Mother lit the gas and began to cook the dinner.妈妈点上煤气，开始做饭。
adj. 干旱的；不毛的，[农] 荒芜的 同义词:hungry, waste, desert These plants will not root in such arid soil .这种植物在这种贫瘠的土地上不会生根。
adj. 形象的；图表的；绘画似的 同义词:ikonic, imagic An international jury made up of prestigious graphic humour artists will select the winners .一个国际评审委员会由著名的图形幽默艺术家将选择赢家。
n. 层，阶层；地层 vt. 用压条法培植；把...堆积成层 vi. 借助压条法生根繁殖 同义词:thickness, degree, stratum, tier Mists layered thick about them.层层雾气将他们笼罩。
n. 范围；球体 vt. 包围；放入球内；使…成球形 adj. 球体的 同义词:extent, boundary, region, scope, spectrum, territory, range, case, invest a mountain village sphered by trees万树丛中的小山村
vt. 辩论；怀疑；阻止；抗拒 vi. 争论 n. 辩论；争吵 同义词:discuss, debate, argue, stem, block, debate, argue with, argument, debate, brush, controversy We disputed with each other on various issues.我们为各种问题互相争论。
n. 裤子；短裤 同义词:britches, short trousers I have on a shirt and pants .我穿了一件衬衫和裤子。
adj. 不可缺少的；绝对必要的；责无旁贷的 n. 不可缺少之物；必不可少的人 同义词:obbligato Your help is indispensable to me .你的帮助对我是绝对必要的。
adj. 庄严的，严肃的；隆重的，郑重的 同义词:serious, sacred, majestic, grave Most representations of George Washington make him look very solemn .乔治。华盛顿在大多数画像中显得很严肃。
adj. 背部的；背的，背侧的 同义词:neural, tergal They also dorsal horn neurons less able to respond to pain signals .此外，鸦片类物质也会降低脊髓背角神经元对疼痛讯息的反应。
adj. 新兴的；出现的；形成的 v. 形成；浮现；显露（emerge的ing形式）；由…中脱出 同义词:rising, forming The sun emerges from behind the clouds.太阳从云层里露出。
adv. 特殊地；区别地 同义词:exceptionally, differentially For the dark matter , however, relaxation distinctively different .对于黑暗物质来说，松弛的方式完全不同。

adj. 椭圆的；卵形的 n. 椭圆形；卵形 同义词:elliptical, ovate, ellipse, elliptical shape Callout with oval outline and pointer from center of text block . Control handles adjust width and height .从文本块中央引出的具有椭圆轮廓线和指针的标注。控制手柄可调整宽度和高度。
vt. 焊接；使结合；使成整体 vi. 焊牢 n. 焊接；焊接点 同义词:combine, bond, jointing, soldering to weld the crack in the water pipe焊接水管的裂缝

adj. 合格的，合适的；符合条件的；有资格当选的 n. 合格者；适任者；有资格者 同义词:qualified, applicable, becoming, shaped, likely, acceptee For instance , to obtain additional federal assistance for unemployment insurance , states must make more workers eligible for benefits , in particular part-time workers .比如为了获得联邦额外的失业保险救助，州政府必须让更多工人——特别是兼职工人——获得更多的救济金。
n. 神话；虚构的人，虚构的事 同义词:fairy story, fairy tales But he also was a control freak and an artist who built his own myth .但同时透纳也是一个控制欲极强的艺术家，喜欢自己创造自己的神话。
adj. 积极的；[数] 正的，[化学][医] 阳性的；确定的，肯定的；实际的，真实的；绝对的 n. 正数；[摄] 正片 同义词:active, established, practical, actual, fixed, effective, sincere I choose the positive side of life .我选择了指出生活积极的一面。
vt. 装饰；使生色 同义词:paint, hang garlands of flowers adorning her hair她头上戴着的花环
n. 假定；设想；担任；采取 同义词:conception, perhaps, if The " logic " of this interpretation of the hypothetical experiment rests on a fundamental assumption .对该假想实验的这种解释的“逻辑”，建立在一个基本假设上。
n. 巨大；暴行；极恶 同义词:greatness, vastness The cruel murderer was put to death for the enormity of his crime .这残人的凶手因罪行的凶残被处以死刑。
adj. 极大的，巨大的；惊人的 同义词:huge, enormous, massive, macro, vast The impact of evacuation and relocation on those with health or functional impairments can be tremendous .撤离和重新安置对这些健康状况欠佳或身体残疾的人影响极大。
vt. 包含，吸收；体现；把……合并 vi. 合并；混合；组成公司 adj. 合并的；一体化的；组成公司的 同义词:involve, contain, absorb, comprise, merge, mix together, amalgamative, pooled to be incorporated a member of the union被吸收为工会会员
vt. 怀孕；构思；以为；持有 vi. 怀孕；设想；考虑 同义词:design, hold, allow, think of, think about He conceived a new plan very quickly.他很快就想出一个新的计划方案。
vt. 使不活动；使不活泼；阻止活动 同义词:deactivate They discovered how to inactivate , or knock out, single genes in laboratory animals .他们发现如何使实验用动物体内个体特定基因不活跃、失去作用。
n. 腰，腰部 同义词:middle, loin The upshot is a device that weighs around 5kg and can be strapped to a user 's waist .其产物便是一种重量仅为5千克左右、可被绑在使用者腰部的装置。
n. 比例；部分；面积；均衡 vt. 使成比例；使均衡；分摊 同义词:ratio, area, equilibrium, scale, part, apportion to proportion the width of a building to its height使建筑物的宽和高比例匀称

n. 限制；监禁；分娩 同义词:limitation, delivery, restriction, qualification, prison He spent six years in jail , mostly in solitary confinement , until his conviction was overturned .六年监狱生活，安瓦尔大部分都是被单独关押，直到冤案平反。
adj. 全部的 adv. 全然地；越发 n. 全部 pron. 全部 同义词:entire, overall, total, utterly, sheerly, full, entirety, allness Now we all know the Muffin Man .现在我们大家都认识松饼人。
adj. 最适宜的 n. 最佳效果；最适宜条件 You must try to find your own . Every day you study , bear this principle of the optimum in mind .你应尽力去发现你自己的最佳点，每天学习时要把这个最适度的原则记在心上。
n. [地理] 冰山；显露部分 同义词:Berg, floeberg A huge iceberg was suddenly spotted by a lookout .一个了望员突然发现一座巨大的冰山。
n. 铅工业；铅管品制造 v. 探究；垂直悬挂；用铅锤测量；灌铅以增重（plumb的现在分词） Check to see if sewage lines are intact before using bathrooms or plumbing .在使用洗手间或马桶之前，奇怪查看下水道是否完好无损。

n. 寒冷；寒意；寒心 adj. 寒冷的；冷漠的；扫兴的 vt. 冷冻，冷藏；使寒心；使感到冷 vi. 冷藏；变冷 同义词:cold, algor, cold, distant, refrigerate I want this beer to chill so I'll leave it in the fridge for an hour.我想要啤酒变凉，因此我把它放在冰箱里一小时。

n. [数] 余数，残余；剩余物；其余的人 adj. 剩余的；吃剩的 vt. 廉价出售；削价出售 vi. 廉价出售；削价出售 同义词:leaving, arithmetical compliment, surplus, residual, odd, bargain sale, undercut, bargain sale The unsalable books are to be remaindered next week.滞销书将于下周削价出售。
n. 界限，边界 vt. 限制；禁闭 同义词:boundary, border, block, set a limit to I wish you would confine yourself to the matter under discussion.希望你只谈目前我们正在讨论的问题。
n. 补偿；报酬；赔偿金 同义词:payment, consideration, insurance, reward, offset As a first step , compensation committees and risk - management committees should be merged .第一步，薪酬委员会和风险管理委员会应合并在一起。
adj. 猖獗的；蔓延的；狂暴的；奔放的 同义词:angry, rude Meanwhile , official corruption is rampant throughout the Communist party and bureaucracy .与此同时，官员腐败之风在整个党政机关蔓延。
n. 主题；科目；[语] 主语；国民 adj. 服从的；易患…的；受制于…的 vt. 使…隶属；使屈从于… 同义词:topic, theme, nation, titles, motive, followed, compliant It is a bounden duty for a soldier to be subjected to the orders.服从命令是军人的天职。
n. 相互作用；[数] 交互作用 同义词:reciprocity, mutual effect Scientists call the interaction of light with phonons the Raman effect .科学家将光与声子的交互作用称为拉曼效应。
n. 海星 同义词:sea star, asteroidean While admitting the beauty of a starfish , he saw greenish toes protruding from the sandy floor .正当他惊叹于海星的美丽时，他看见从沙质海床里露出来绿色的脚趾头。
n. 拥挤；拥塞；充血 同义词:injection, crowding Department stores are often congested before Christmas.圣诞节前百货商店里常常很拥挤。
n. 大腿，股 同义词:upper leg A small fish brushed against his thigh , sending a shock like electricity through his body.一条小鱼碰了他的大腿一下，他觉得那鱼像是对他闪电般地一刺。

n. 情感；敏感性；感觉；识别力 同义词:emotion, consciousness, will, affect, discrimination From the attention to human sensibility , Yuan mei commenced his study of " Xingling " esthetics .袁枚对“性灵”美学思想的阐发是从关注人自身的“情欲”、“性情”开始的。
n. 纪念碑；历史遗迹；不朽的作品 vt. 为…树碑 同义词:memorial, cenotaph monument helps all of us remember George Washington , the first President of the United States .这座纪念碑使我们所有人都怀念美国的第一位总统乔治·华盛顿。
adj. （建筑物等）壮观的；威风的；（仪表）堂堂的；给人深刻印象的 v. impose的ing形式 同义词:spectacular, impressionistic to impose duties on imported wines向进口酒征税
adj. 过敏的；高灵敏度的；超感光度的 同义词:irritable, touchy Some argue that the absence of parasites is leading to hypersensitive immune systems .有些理论认为少了寄生虫的寄生便导致了免疫系统的超敏反应。
n. 制度；建立；（社会或宗教等）公共机构；习俗 同义词:system, convention Once more , the markets seem to be hanging on the fate of one big financial institution .各大金融市场的走向似乎再一次系于某家大型金融机构的命运。
n. 零售商；传播的人 同义词:bania, tradesman A small retailer should compare prices with a similar store .一个小的零售商应与类似的商店比较价格。
n. 增殖，扩散；分芽繁殖 同义词:diffusion, propagation proliferated ideas层出不穷的想法
adj. 虚构的，假想的；想像的；虚数的 同义词:fictitious, figmentary My pet will be an imaginary duck .我的宠物会是一只虚拟的鸭子。
vt. 操纵；操作；巧妙地处理；篡改 同义词:man, guide, work, handle Do you know how to manipulate a computer ?你知道怎样操作计算机吗?
n. 口吃；妨碍；阻止 同义词:prevention, intervention, violation, check He impediment in speech .那小女孩说话有点口吃。
adj. 惊人的，异常的，奇妙的；巨大的 同义词:tremendous, wonderful, huge, enormous, massive This has helped to fuel China's prodigious growth .这帮助成就了中国巨大的经济增长。
adj. 农村的，乡下的；田园的，有乡村风味的 同义词:country, sylvan Rural children face the same risks as city children .乡村孩子和城市孩子面临同样的危险。
adv. 有机地；有组织地；器官上地 同义词:systematically They also say some of the food tested may have been sold as organic although it was not organically grown .当然，他们还认为，有些被检测的食品是作为有机食品出售的，其实它们根本就不是有机生长的。
adj. 有…倾向的；打算做…的；有某种健康状态的 v. 处理；配置；使适应（dispose的过去分词）；使有倾向 同义词:prone, liable, conditioned He disposed his money in charity.他将自己的钱用于慈善事业。
n. 雕刻家 同义词:structurer Thus , alluvial channel flows are simultaneously sculptor and sculpture .这样，冲积河槽水流既是塑造者，同时又是被塑造者。
adj. 不能克服的；不能超越的；难以对付的 同义词:unsurmountable, unvanquishable I say the railroading problem is insurmountable .我说铁路运输问题是克服不了的。
adj. 有责任的，有义务的；应受罚的；有…倾向的；易…的 同义词:responsible, bound, accountable, prone I only want to know if you have anything liable for tax .我只是想知道你们有什么要上税的东西。
n. 刺痛；讽刺，刺激；刺毛 vt. 刺；驱使；使…苦恼；使…疼痛 vi. 刺痛；被刺痛；感到剧痛 同义词:stimulus, smart, incentive, excitement, hit, stick, pink, smart, bite He was stung by a wasp.他被马蜂螫了一下。
n. 样品，样本；标本 同义词:pattern, swatch The problem before us is where we can find specimen .我们面前的问题是我们在哪儿能找到标本。
vt. 缩写，使省略；使简短 vi. 使用缩写词 同义词:syncopate The ceremony was abbreviated by rain.因为下雨，仪式从简。
n. 补语；余角；补足物 vt. 补足，补助 同义词:make up a loss, make sth up This year 's report will use the Alkire - Foster approach to complement its own Human Development Index .今年的报告还将采用阿尔凯尔-福斯特方法，作为其人类发展指数的补充。

adj. 不顾一切的；令人绝望的；极度渴望的 同义词:venturous, devil-may-care Outsiders may do more to help — at least to tackle the desperate plight of civilians .局外人也许能给予更多的帮助——至少可以缓解平民的绝望困境。

adv. 不可避免地；必然地 同义词:necessarily, ineluctably Young people today understand that the world is now truly and inevitably smaller .今天的年轻人发现世界在变小是真实的却不可避免的。

n. 礼貌；礼仪；端庄 同义词:ceremony, protocol Mr. Slope 's civility had been more than ordinarily greasy .斯洛普先生的礼仪比平日更为谄媚。

adj. 舒适的；温暖的；紧身的；隐藏的 vt. 使变得温暖舒适；隐藏 vi. 偎依；舒适地蜷伏 n. 舒适温暖的地方；雅室 同义词:comfortable, pleasant, warm, easy, hidden, lock, pocket, nestle up The small room snugged with the fire burning.生上火后，小屋变得暖和舒服了。

adj. 耐用的，持久的 n. 耐用品 同义词:continued, sustained, service, lasting, hardgoods They would not be " welfare payments " from rich to poor but instead something far more important and durable .这些投资将不会是富国给穷国的「社会福利款项」，而是更重要、更持久的投资。

adj. 静止的；不活动的；沉寂的 同义词:still, resting Those " oligarchs " not in prison or exile are indeed politically quiescent .那些没有身陷囹圄和流亡海外的“寡头”的确在政治上都选择了“沉默是金”。

adj. 提神的；使清爽的；使人重新振作的 v. 使清新；恢复精神（refresh的ing形式） 同义词:life-giving This is a refreshing change from the politics of climate change , which is all about the generics .相较于充斥着泛泛之谈的气候变化政治主张，这是个令人耳目一新的转变。
adj. 稳健的，温和的；适度的，中等的；有节制的 vi. 变缓和，变弱 vt. 节制；减轻 同义词:pacific, medium, secondary, soft, middle, weaken, deny oneself, allay She should moderate her language when children are present.在孩子面前，她说话应该节制。

adj. 均匀的；[数] 齐次的；同种的 同义词:conspecific We should note that the elements of a flexibility matrix are not necessarily dimensionally homogeneous .我们应该注意柔度矩阵中的诸元素不一定是量纲完全一样。
vt. 认出，识别；承认 vi. 确认，承认；具结 同义词:identify, spot, accept, agree, grant, accept, confirm on I recognize you now.You are Mary's husband.我现在认出你来了，你是玛丽的丈夫。

n. 疲劳，疲乏；杂役 vt. 使疲劳；使心智衰弱 vi. 疲劳 adj. 疲劳的 同义词:tiredness, weariness, wear down, tire Climbing the mountain fatigued the whole scout troop.登山使整个侦察连感到疲劳。
n. 层级；等级制度 In the hierarchy of the Soviet empire , Chechnya was a backwater .在苏维埃帝国的阶级制度，车臣就是一潭死水。

adj. 垂直的，直立的；[解剖] 头顶的，顶点的 n. 垂直线，垂直面 同义词:standing, perpendicular, perpendicular plane, perpendicular line We call this the vertical migration .我们叫他们垂直迁徙。
n. [地物] 极光；曙光 同义词:polar lights It was the Great Aurora of 1859 itself that ushered in a new paradigm.实际上，正是1859年这次「大极光事件」确立了新的学说。

n. 垃圾；轿，担架；一窝（动物的幼崽）；凌乱 vt. 乱丢；给…垫褥草；把…弄得乱七八糟 vi. 产仔；乱扔废弃物 同义词:refuse, garbage, junk, rubbish, trash, give birth The students littered their classroom.学生们在教室乱扔东西。
adv. 最；非常，极其；最多；几乎 adj. 大部分的，多数的；最多的 n. 大部分，大多数 同义词:extremely, badly, highly, greatly, almost, nearly, too, large, maximum, bulk, masses of most popular color this summer is pink .今年夏天最流行的颜色是粉红色。
adj. 可理解的；明了的；仅能用智力了解的 同义词:accessible, comprehensible She could hear the questions and gave intelligible answers .她能聆听问题，并给予适切的答案。

n. 多样化；变化 同义词:variation, shift, change, turn, mutation A more fundamental point is simply that diversification cannot work well in a credit bubble because virtually all asset categories are driven up by leverage .更基本的一点就是，多样化在信用泡沫中无法正常发挥作用，因为几乎所有资产类别都通过杠杆作用被抬高了。
n. 典雅；高雅 If you are out to describe the truth , leave elegance to the tailor .如果你试图描述真理，那就等于叫裁缝学会优雅。
n. [电] 变流器，整流器；转化器 同义词:rectifier, commutator Media converter : A device which converts data from one storage medium to another .媒体转换机能：把数据从一贮存媒体转往另一媒体的装置。

adv. 完全地；绝对地；全然地；彻底地，十足地 同义词:totally, entirely, completely, absolutely, thoroughly, fully, strictly Today the notion of forever concealing the murder of many millions of people may seem utterly crazy .今天，要想永远掩盖起对于百万人的屠杀，这种想法似乎是荒唐透顶的。
adv. 众所周知地；声名狼藉地；恶名昭彰地 同义词:arrantly But the database is notoriously flawed .但是该数据库故障重重。
adj. 复杂的；精致的；久经世故的；富有经验的 v. 使变得世故；使迷惑；篡改（sophisticate的过去分词形式） 同义词:complicated, experienced, involved, detailed, exquisite, mystified He has now been sophisticated.他现在已变得老于世故了。

vt. 突出；强调；使显著；加亮 n. 最精彩的部分；最重要的事情；加亮区 同义词:emphasize, stress, first thing His remarks highlighted his own function.他的讲话突出了他个人的作用。
vt. 超载，超过负荷 n. 超载；负荷过多 同义词:superimposed load, surcharge The electrical system in your house would be overloaded if you used too many electric home appliances at once.如果你同时使用许多家用电器的话，你家里的电力系统就会超载。
vt. 阐明，举例说明；图解 vi. 举例 同义词:clarify, elucidate, give an example, cite an example He illustrates the lesson with a picture.他用一张图片来说明这篇课文。
n. 经营大牧场 v. 经营牧场（ranch的ing形式） Itinerant ranching reached its peak in the 1880s .1880年代，巡回大牧场达到了顶峰。
vt. 遣散；使复员；使退伍（demobilise） 同义词:deactivate, muster out to demobilize troops or an army遣散军队
prep. 在（表示存在或出现的地点、场所、位置、空间）；以（某种价格、速度等）；向；因为；朝；忙于 同义词:be, towards, unto, out at home在家
adj. 保守的 n. 保守派，守旧者 同义词:standpat, backward-looking, old guard, pontificator Even so , the report says the prediction of substantial damage by 2030 is conservative .虽然如此，报告还指出，对2030年破坏程度的预测是保守的。
n. [雷达] 雷达，无线电探测器 Until radar technique was used in astronomy , Man 's knowledge of Venus was still very superficial .直到雷达技术应用于天文学以前，人类对金星的了解还极为肤浅。

adj. 水生的；水栖的；在水中或水面进行的 n. 水上运动；水生植物或动物 同义词:acquatic, aquicolous The major bones in human knees , backs and wrists arose in aquatic creatures hundreds of millions of years ago .人类的膝盖、背部及手腕的主要骨骼发展，在数亿年前的水生动物阶段便已经定型。
adj. （常用来构成复合词）充满…的，塞满了…的 v. 包装（pack的过去分词） 同义词:steeped, fraught We squeezed through the narrow , chattering , jam packed bar to the entrance of the big room.狭窄的酒吧里喧喧嚷嚷，挤得满满的。我们挤过人堆，来到大厅入口处。
vt. 栖息；居住于；占据 vi. （古）居住；栖息 同义词:people, occupy, bag, belong, room, harbor, live, dwell to inhabit a city居住在城市
n. 淀粉；刻板，生硬 vt. 给…上浆 同义词:rigidity, amylum Starch my shirt's collar, please.请把我的衬衣领浆硬。
adj. 可行的；能养活的；能生育的 同义词:feasible, working This proved that the technology , although still at an early stage , was viable .这表明：该技术尽管仍处于萌芽阶段，但确是可行的。
adj. 种族的；人种的 同义词:racial, tribal They claim to be the world 's largest ethnic group without a state of their own .他们声称，在世界上没有自己国土的民族里，他们是最大的一个。
v. 涌出；迸出 n. 涌出；迸发 同义词:spring forth, outrush, well up Oil gushed from the well.油从油井中喷出。

n. 魅力；魔力；入迷 同义词:charm, grace This has helped prompt them to join the fray and , in many cases, rediscover a fascination with collecting that dates back thousands of years .这些因素推动它们加入了这股热潮，并且重新发现了具有数千年历史的收藏爱好的魅力。
vt. 引起，唤起；博得 同义词:earn, attract, cause, produce, occasion to evoke a spirit from the dead从死者身上招魂
adj. 有事业心的；有进取心的；有魄力的；有胆量的 同义词:aggressive, courageous Man is usually a wandering and enterprising animal .人通常是一种游动的和有进取心的动物。
n. 形成；构造；编队 同义词:constitution, fabric, becoming, structure, build In many sedimentary basins the salinity of the formation water increases with depth or compaction .在许多沉积盆地中，地层水的含盐量随深度或压实作用而增高。
adj. 相互矛盾的；抵触的 v. 竞赛（compete的ing形式） 同义词:contradictive About 800 athletes competed in fifteen events.大约有800名运动员参加了15个项目的竞赛。
n. 名誉；声望 vt. 名誉；认为；把…称为 同义词:credit, name, prestige, expect, count, guess, find, feel He was reputed to be a millionaire.大家说他是个百万富翁。
adj. 有责任的，应服从的；有义务的；经得起检验的 同义词:responsible, bound, liable, accountable We amenable to the law .我们全都是对这法律负责的。

adj. 集体的；共同的；集合的；集体主义的 n. 集团；集合体；集合名词 同义词:mutual, corporate, common, joint, bloc, clan Still collective effort of the states is already beginning to compensate for the lack of reductions by the Bush administration .不过，美国各州的努力全部加起来，已经使得布希政府没有降低排放量的情形有所补偿。
adj. 高尚的；尊贵的；兴奋的 v. 高举；赞扬；使激动（exalt的过去分词） 同义词:magnificent, noble Debt , such an exalted financing tool a little more than a year ago , is now a four -letter word .债务，在一年前还是令人放心的金融工具，现在仅仅是个令人厌恶的词了。
vi. 剥落；成片状剥落 vt. 使…成薄片；将…剥落 n. 小薄片；火花 同义词:chip, shell, spark, A FRAME An approach called PVD is main way to prepare nano scale flake at present .本文阐述的物理气相沉积法（vd法）目前制备纳米片状铝粉的主要方法。

n. 毁坏，荒废 同义词:demolition, disruption The devastation across central Florida from a tornado and storm is severe and widespread .一场龙卷风席卷了佛罗里达州，造成了严重的，大规模的毁坏。
adj. 渗透的；尖锐的；有洞察力的 v. 穿透；贯穿（penetrate的ing形式） 同义词:osmolar, saturated, interpenetrating The nail easily penetrated the soft wood.钉子很容易地就穿透了软木材。
vi. 遵守；顺从，遵从；答应 同义词:engage, abide by/obey/observe Visitors to the mine must comply with the rules.到矿上参观的人必须遵守规章。
n. 砍；排骨；商标；[网]削球 vt. 剁碎；砍 (俚)丑人 同义词:brand, label, logo, cut, hew, hew Chop some wood for the fire.给炉子劈点木柴来。
n. 兽群，畜群；放牧人 vi. 成群，聚在一起 vt. 放牧；使成群 同义词:drove, menagerie, grass, feed, range Wild geese herd to the south in autumn every year.每年秋天大雁都成群结队地飞往南方。
vt. 移植；迁移；使移居 n. 移植；移植器官；被移植物；移居者 vi. 移植；迁移；移居 同义词:remove, transfer of culture, implantation, engraftment, remove, move I transplanted those flowers to the garden.我把那些花移植到花园里。
n. 脉纹的排列；脉络 v. 使有纹理（vein的现在分词形式） 同义词:venation Low expansion resin is, prevents from casting defects , especially veining and hot tear caused from thermal expansion.低膨胀树脂对解决铸造缺陷，特别是对毛刺、热裂尤为有效。

n. 反对票；反对论 vt. 精读；默记 adv. 反面地 adj. 欺诈的 prep. 以… 同义词:non, peruse, learn by heart, reversely, deceptive, imposturous I'll write a letter to the manager and see if I can con him into okaying it.我将给经理写封信，看看是否能说服他同意这件事。

adj. 超自然的；神奇的，不可思议的 n. 超自然现象；不可思议的事 同义词:magic, mysterious, supranatural In that case a sense of being watched by a supernatural being might be useful.这种方式是让人们感到有一种超自然的东西在监视着他。
n. 木炭（过去式charcoaled，过去分词charcoaled，现在分词charcoaling，第三人称单数charcoals）；炭笔 vt. 用木炭画 同义词:xylanthrax, wood coal The artist dusted the charcoal drawing down to a faint image .这位画家在素描上撒粉使其变为暗淡的图像。

vt. 促进；帮助；使容易 同义词:promote, boost, further It would facilitate matters if they were more co-operative.如果他们再合作些就容易多了。
vi. 区分，区别 vt. 区分，区别 同义词:to distinguish, tell apart, to distinguish, tell apart Its slate roof differentiates this house from others.这间房子的石板瓦房顶使其有别于这地区的其他房子。

adj. 原始的；主要的；最初的 n. 被压抑童年情绪的释放 vt. 释放（被压抑的童年情绪） 同义词:original, major, central, premier, leading, deliver, free, unhold " The Last of the Mohicans " breathes an atmosphere of almost primal innocence .《最后的莫希干人》则散发着一种近乎原始时代天真无邪的纯洁的气息。
vt. 使…膨胀；使…扩张 vi. 扩张；膨胀 同义词:fill, swell with Habitual overeating had distended the boy's stomach.习惯性的暴食使这男孩的胃扩张了。
n. 食人；嗜食同类；残忍的行为 同义词:anthropophagy The war is just like the cannibalism of animals .战争就如同动物之间的互相残杀。
n. [地质] 风化作用；[水利] 泻水斜度；挡风雨材料 v. 风干；使退色；经受住（weather的ing形式） 同义词:eolation, airing Certain plants play an additional role in weathering .某些植物起了风化作用的辅助作用。
adj. 有效的，可得的；可利用的；空闲的 同义词:valid, effective, virtual, telling, significant To maintain the integrity of the whole , these available choices are reciprocal ones .为要保持整体的完整性，这些可用的选择是相对的。
n. 环境；上下文；来龙去脉 同义词:circumstance, setting, surrounding, condition Field above a hidden context field can not be a custom group field .在一个隐藏的相关字段上面不能是一个自定义分组字段。
vt. 忍受；默许；宽恕 同义词:stomach, go, stand, abide, tough to tolerate heresy容许信奉异教

vt. 浪费；使…消散 vi. 驱散；放荡 同义词:lose, spend, to break up, sow one's wild oats The sun dissipated the mist.阳光驱散了薄雾。
n. 水分；湿度；潮湿；降雨量 同义词:rainfall, humidity content They sense soil moisture in the immediate vicinity of the cup.他们能对直接接近林子的土壤水分作出感应。

n. 大豆；黄豆 同义词:soja, soya beans Soybean oil is refined by continuous procedures.豆油的净化是连续进行的。

adj. 空的；中空的，空腹的；凹的；虚伪的 n. 洞；山谷；窟窿 vt. 使成为空洞 vi. 形成空洞 adv. 彻底地；无用地 同义词:empty, artificial, false, bare, vacant, hole, cavity, cavitate, thoroughly, entirely, completely, fully, tight He hollowed out a cave in the snowfield for night.他在雪原上挖了个洞以过夜。
adj. 飞逝的；转瞬间的 v. 迅速移动（fleet的ing形式） 同义词:zapping To avoid making the story too heavy and serious , the film does also have its fleeting moments of silly fun .为了避免剧情过于沉重、严肃，影片还特意穿插了短暂的荒谬搞笑情节。

n. 照明；[光] 照度；启发；灯饰（需用复数）；阐明 同义词:lumination, luminous intensity A little bit of knowledge illuminates much around it, and that new illumination feeds on itself , so one corner explodes .一点点知识就可以阐释周围的许多现象，而新的阐释又启发了知识自身，于是知识的角落迅速扩大。

adv. 分别地；各自地，独自地 同义词:separately, alone, in several In all cases , the enzymes can be dissociated into two distinct protein components , termed A and B , respectively .在所有情况下，这个酶均可分解成两个不同的蛋白质组分，分别称作A和b。

n. 爆发，喷发；火山灰；出疹 同义词:explosion, burst, outbreak This is a warning sign for an imminent eruption .这就是火山临近爆发前的一个警示信号。
n. 空缺；空位；空白；空虚 同义词:gap, blank I see a vacancy board outside for a kitchen helper . Is it still available?我在外面招工牌上看到有个厨房帮手的空缺。这空位现在还有吗？

vi. 探索，寻找；挖地洞，挖通道；住入地洞，躲藏起来；钻进某处；偎依著 vt. 挖掘，挖出；在…挖洞（或通道）；使躲入洞穴 n. （兔、狐等的）洞穴，地道；藏身处，住处 同义词:explore, search after, to dig, tap into, residence, hole, subway, underground, accommodation They burrowed into the ground.他们掘洞钻入地下。
adj. 机敏的；狡猾的，诡计多端的 同义词:designing, knowing, subtle One is that non- US companies have become more astute about achieving global scale .其一是，非美国公司在实现全球规模方面已经变得更加精明。
n. 港口；避难所，安息所 vt. 为……提供避难处；安置……于港中 同义词:port, home, harbor He havened his motorboat on a small harbour.他把摩托艇停泊在一个小港上。
vt. 使用；授予；放置；留宿 同义词:make use of, award, fashion, give, employ The country bestowed its highest medal on the war hero.国家给战争英雄颁发国家最高奖章。
n. 士气，斗志 同义词:fight, martialism Finally , believe in what you are saying to boost your morale .最后，通过深信你所说的来增加斗志。

n. 平台；梯田；阳台 vt. 使成梯田，使成阶地；使有平台屋顶 vi. 成阶地；成梯田；筑成坛 adj. （女服）叠层式的 同义词:platform, balcony a terraced garden梯形花园
vt. 保持；雇；记住 同义词:keep up, to keep If you want to retain youthful vigor,you have to take regular exercise.如果你想保持青春活力，你就得经常锻炼。
vt. 团结；凝固 vi. 团结；凝固 同义词:rally, join forces, league, set, rally Then their ideas were solidified.此后，他们的思想统一了。

adj. 体操的，体育的 同义词:calisthenic Grammar is a good gymnastic .语法是一门很好的训练科目。
vi. 盛行，流行；战胜，获胜 同义词:obtain, win Justice has prevailed,the guilty man has been punished.正义已经获胜，有罪的人受到了惩罚。
n. 承包人；立契约者 同义词:entrepreneur In order to solve the problem , we plan to work through a contractor .为了解决这个问题，我们正计划通过一个承包机构来做这项工作。

n. [化学] 沉淀，[化学] 沉淀物；冰雹；坠落；鲁莽 同义词:deposit, sludge, sediment, subsidence The cline is considered the probable result of geographic trends in precipitation , temperature , and perhaps also photoperiod .人们认为这种梯度变异可能是降水量，温度也许还有光周期等地理趋势造成的结果。
n. 解决方案；溶液；溶解；解答 同义词:liquor, dissolution The Afghan police , corrupt and poorly equipped , are often part of the problem rather than the solution .阿富汗警察，腐败并且装备落后，通常是问题的一部分，而不是去解决问题。
adj. 不育的；无菌的；贫瘠的；不毛的；枯燥乏味的 同义词:hungry, desert Best of all, the yen is not sterile asset like gold .最重要的是，日元并不是像黄金那样的“不结果”资产。
n. 谷仓；畜棚；车库；靶（核反应截面单位） vt. 把…贮存入仓 同义词:granary, garage to barn hay and grain把干草、谷物存入仓内

n. 不协调；不一致；不适宜 同义词:variance, disparity When I point to the incongruity , Chen doesn't miss a beat: " That shows one thing — the assumption that people like money is correct ."当我指出室内外的不协调时，陈其一立刻回应：「这只证明了一件事──人们爱钱的假设是正确的。」
n. 上皮，表皮 同义词:epithelium, scarfskin Within epidermis develops a ring of parenchyma cells , the cortex .在表皮细胞内有一个质壁细胞环，即皮层。
n. 天篷；华盖；遮篷；苍穹 vt. 用天蓬遮盖；遮盖 同义词:baldachin, marquee, blot out, overcurtain The sky was canopied with dark clouds.天空乌云密布。
n. 弧（度）；弧光（全称electric arc）；弧形物；天穹 adj. 圆弧的；反三角函数的 vt. 形成电弧；走弧线 Ranger 6 arced on a graceful,curving course towards the moon.(月球探测卫星)徘徊者6号沿着一条优美的曲线循弧线飞向月球。
adv. 偶然地，意外地 同义词:accidentally, unexpectedly Fortuitously , large foreign currency reserves leave East Asian economies well placed to manage the change -over.当前的一个有利条件是，东亚经济体拥有庞大的外汇储备，因此有能力应对经济形势的变化。
n. 面纱；面罩；遮蔽物；托词 vt. 遮蔽；掩饰；以面纱遮掩；用帷幕分隔 vi. 蒙上面纱；出现轻度灰雾 同义词:yashmak, facemask, shadow, shield, curtain She veiled her face when she went out into the street.她上街时用面纱蒙着脸。
adv. 贤明地；有才能地 同义词:philosophically, sagely The ingeniously engineered Trojan horse was also his idea .那个天才的特洛伊木马同样也是他的主意。
n. [临床] 叩诊；振动；碰撞；敲打乐器；打击乐器组 同义词:vibration, collision, impact, crash A percussion instrument consisting of metal tubes or bars that emit tones when struck .由金属管或条棒组成的，敲击时能发出乐音的打击乐器。
n. 上升；上坡路；登高 同义词:rise, upgrade, raise India 's ascent is, however , far from assured .然而，印度的高速增长远非确定无疑。
n. 顶点；最高级会议；最高阶层 adj. 最高级的；政府首脑的 同义词:height, sky, peak, apex, crown, first-chop, ritzy He kept Stalin company to summit during the World War Ⅱ.第二次世界大战期间他曾陪伴斯大林参加过最高级会谈。
n. 感染；传染；影响；传染病 同义词:impression, affection, effect, influence, incidence It can also check for signs of infection .验血还能检查出受感染的征兆。
vt. 走私；偷运 vi. 走私，私运；偷带 the smuggled goods走私货
adj. 未经证实的，无事实根据的 同义词:uncorroborated, unattested Many contemporary publications quote figures that unsubstantiated .许多现行刊物所采用的数字是不确切的。
n. 身份；同一性，一致；特性；恒等式 同义词:accordance, estate, unity, agreement, quality How do you think this shapes their identity ?你认为这会怎样塑造他们的特性？
vt. 使形成；发生；生殖 同义词:go on, call into being His kind smile soon generated friendliness.他友善的微笑很快造成了友好的气氛。
n. 服装，装束；戏装，剧装 vt. 给…穿上服装 同义词:clothing, wear, garment, apparel The leading role in the film is costumed in medieval armor.影片中的主角穿着中古时代的甲胄。
n. 裂缝；不和；[木] 裂口 vt. 使断裂；使分开 vi. 裂开 同义词:crack, split, separate, unhinge, gap, seam, spring off The fog is rifted.雾散了。

item.word: go against the grain to do sth
item.trans: vi. 走；达到；运转；趋于 n. 去；进行；尝试 vt. 忍受；出产；以…打赌 同义词:walk, step, track, stroke, conduct, process, experiment, try, yield, stomach, stand, abide, tough to go 90 miles an hour每小时走90英里
n. 实体；存在；本质 同义词:presence, existence, essence, principle, texture With bees one always talks about the colony as a single entity .总是将蜜蜂这个群体作为一个单独的整体来谈论。
prep. 关于；属于；…的；由…组成的 同义词:concerning, about, as for, with reference to, in relation to the king of England英格兰国王
n. 运动；移动；旅行 同义词:movement, removal, exercise, sport, campaign Proconsul gives us a good idea of the anatomy and locomotion of an early ape .祖猿让我们对早期猿类的解剖结构与移动模式，有比较完整的了解。
n. 病原体；病菌 同义词:causative agent, harmful bacteria When the pathogen benefits from environmental conditions , disease spread is more likely .当环境条件对病原体有利时，疾病扩散的可能性增加。
adj. 虚构的；假想的；编造的；假装的 同义词:affected, imaginary, assumed, simulate They bought the materials fictitious names .他们用假名买下了这些材料。
vt. 即兴创作；即兴表演；临时做；临时提供 vi. 即兴创作；即兴表演；临时凑合 同义词:extemporize to improvise a song即兴创作一首歌曲

vt. 使…完整；使…成整体；求…的积分；表示…的总和 vi. 求积分；取消隔离；成为一体 adj. 整合的；完全的 n. 一体化；集成体 同义词:become one flesh, complete, absolute, full, total, round, gleichschaltung to integrate the residential blocks with the rest of the college使住宿区与大学其他部分连成一体
n. 转矩，[力] 扭矩；项圈，金属领圈 同义词:torgue, turning moment The cage is connected by a spindle to the torque spring and pointer .用销子将其骨架结构与转矩弹簧和指针连接。

n. 复兴；复苏；新生 同义词:reconstruction, fresh, renaissance, renewal " We're learning a lot on the International Space Station right now on air revitalization and water recovery , " Drake said.德雷克说：“关于空气再生和水循环利用问题，现在我们从国际空间站上学到了很多。

adj. 活的；现存的；活跃的；逼真的 n. 生活；生存；生计 v. 生活；居住（live的ing形式）；度过 同义词:realistic, existing, active, excited, going, life, existence, livelihood, keep, subsistence, spending, dwelling She outlived her son by many years.她比她儿子还多活了好几年。
adj. 无前途的，没有希望的 同义词:futureless It also diverts computational cycles away from unpromising areas .它还把计算周期转移出没有希望的区。
vt. 扭曲；使失真；曲解 vi. 扭曲；变形 同义词:contort, misinterpret, become deformed, to morph Arthritis had distorted her fingers.关节炎使她手指变形了。
n. 孵化；舱口 vt. 孵；策划 vi. 孵化 同义词:incubation, engineer, scheme, incubate to hatch eggs孵蛋，抱窝
n. 笔记；音符；票据；注解；纸币；便笺；照会；调子 vt. 注意；记录；注解 同义词:bill, minute, William, watching, register, take care of to note a case对一桩案子做笔录
vi. 同居（尤指未婚而同居者） 同义词:live together Through it , we learn of the many others – the wondrous diversity of flora and fauna – with whom we cohabit on this planet .通过它，我们认识了与我们共同生活在地球上的许多其它生物——多种多样的奇妙动植物。
vt. 强迫，迫使；强使发生 同义词:pressure, force, enforce They were often compelled to work eleven or twelve hours a day.他们常常被迫每天工作十一二个小时。
n. 伪造；伪造罪；伪造物 同义词:fabrication, falsification This entire email is false . It is fake . It is a forgery .整个电邮是假的。它是捏造的。它是编造的。
n. 巨像；巨人；巨大的东西 同义词:giant, monster Now while the Colossus is very dangerous against ground targets , it's much more vulnerable to an air counterattack.到现在“巨神像”是个非常危险的高地攻击目标，更加容易受到空中打击。
n. 成语，习语；土话 同义词:phrase, dialect Although this is a serious subject , using this idiom indicates a kind of humor as well .尽管这是个严肃的话题，但是还是要用这个成语来表示一种幽默的方式。
vt. 歼灭；战胜；废止 vi. 湮灭；湮没 同义词:defeat, suppress, submerge Our soldiers annihilated a force of five hundred enemy troops.我们的战士消灭了 500名敌军。

adj. 符合习俗的，传统的；常见的；惯例的 同义词:traditional, usual, familiar, classical The vaccine works differently from conventional vaccines in that it does not prevent infection directly .这个疫苗作用方式不同于一般的疫苗，它并不会直接防止感染。
adj. 极光的；曙光的；玫瑰红的 Today these particles lead to auroral displays .如今粒子导致极光出现。
vt. 显示；透露；揭露；泄露 n. 揭露；暴露；门侧，窗侧 同义词:make clear, prove, disclose, expose, uncovery, exposure to sth I should be glad to give you any help if you reveal your thoughts to me.如果你把你的想法透露给我，我愿意尽全力帮助你。
vt. 投，抛；计算；浇铸；投射（光、影、视线等） n. 投掷，抛；铸件，[古生] 铸型；演员阵容；脱落物 vi. 投，抛垂钓鱼钩；计算，把几个数字加起来 同义词:throw, pitch, mould, figure, putting, throw, figure, shy The boy cast a stone into the water.男孩把一块石头扔进水中。

n. 表现；显示；示威运动 同义词:exhibition, representation, display, show His thesis was that life is a process -- a behavior that is not bound to a specific material manifestation .他的论点在于，生命是一个进程——是不受特殊材料表现形式限制的行为。
vt. 使再生；革新 vi. 再生；革新 adj. 再生的；革新的 同义词:reform, revivify, innovate, innovative, reproductive They were spiritually regenerated by his speech.他们听了他的讲话后在精神上获得了新生。

n. 恢复；复位；王政复辟；归还 同义词:recovery, replacement, retrieval, renewal, resumption The third big achievement , alongside democracy and prosperity , is the partial restoration of public -spiritedness, trust , decency and kindness .除民主与繁荣外的第三项重大成就是部分恢复了公众精神、信任、体面与和善。
n. 工匠，技工 同义词:workman, craftsman Every man is the artisan of his own fortune .每个人都是制造其自身命运的工匠。
n. 铝 Depending on the course of the dollar , fluctuations inside of , or temporary breaks beyond , the contemplated aluminum price range can be expected .基于美元的走势、内部因素的波动以及暂时打破高点的情况，铝的预期价格范围是能够估计的。
adj. 年度的；每年的 n. 年刊，年鉴；一年生植物 同义词:yearly, etesian, year book, almanac When annual income is forced to exceed annual expenditure , the result may well be misery .当每年的收入被迫超过每年支出时，其结果很可能就是痛苦。
n. 动物群；[动] 动物区系 同义词:zoology By contrast , the extent to which the Gat threatens Australia 's fauna is not clear .相形之下，猫威胁澳大利亚动物群的程度现在还没有弄清楚。
vt. 表示；意味；预示 vi. 有重要性；要紧；冒充内行 同义词:indicate, bid, forecast, mean, shadow, matter, count for It signifies “No.”这表示不行。
n. 能力；容量；资格，地位；生产力 同义词:ability, competence, membership, status, productivity Subordination and silence best became their years and capacity .服从与沉默，最适合他们的年令与能力。
n. 同时代的人；同时期的东西 adj. 当代的；同时代的；属于同一时期的 同义词:coeval, modern-day, cotemporary This play is the image of contemporary urban life .这个剧本是当代城市生活的生动写照。
n. 侵入；闯入 同义词:penetration, effraction Theory and experiment show that this method has better ability in intrusion detection .理论和实验表明该方法具有较好的检测能力。
n. [军] 装甲；盔甲 vt. 为…装甲 同义词:mail, helmets Their feathers were like armor impenetrable to steel.它们的羽毛就象刀剑穿不透的盔甲。
n. 螃蟹；蟹肉；脾气乖戾的人；起重机 vt. 抱怨；破坏；使偏航 vi. 捕蟹；发牢骚；抱怨 同义词:crane, derrick, destroy, undermine, whine about, pinge Broadside winds crabbed the boat close to the riverbank.从舷侧吹过来的风使船斜行到河岸。
n. 脚后跟；踵 vt. 倾侧 vi. 倾侧 同义词:careen He's being heeled by the police.他正受到警方的追捕。
n. 领域；域名；产业；地产 同义词:province, territory, world, industry, kingdom, universe, field I can't answer your question about photography . It 's not in my domain .我不能回答你关于摄影的问题，这不在我所学的范围内。
n. 真菌，霉菌；菌类 同义词:eumycete, mycete A more radical answer , though, may be to use a completely different sort of insecticide : a fungus .更根本的答案可能会是利用一个完全不同的杀虫剂：一种真菌。
